message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to part with it for $2000000. What do you think?
Alice, your offer is significantly higher than my budget. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $800000 for it. This is my maximum offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. It's a great product and I'm confident it will bring a lot of value to you. Can you meet me in the middle?

Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still firm on my offer of $800000. I'm sure this product is valuable, but I'm limited by my budget. This is my final offer, let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're firm on your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm counteroffering at $1000000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but unfortunately, $1000000 is still a bit too high for me. While I'm determined to get this product, my budget restricts me to $850000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can finally reach an agreement.

I understand that you're still looking to save a bit, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to make a small concession, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, while your offer is getting closer to my budget, it's still above my limit. I understand you're determined to get a specific price, but I'm only willing to go up to $900000.  This is truly my final offer. If you're not able to accept this, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that you're trying to save as much as possible, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $975000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
